entries.name: advanced-orchestration-patterns
entries.intent: Implements sophisticated orchestration patterns including Blackboard, Circuit Breaker, Dynamic Replanning, Hierarchical Decomposition, and Saga patterns for resilient multi-agent coordination

entries.name: agent-router
entries.intent: Dynamic agent discovery and routing - queries main registry to select specialized code agents based on Jira context, file patterns, and task keywords

entries.name: approval-orchestrator
entries.intent: Multi-level approval workflow orchestrator with gates, escalation rules, delegation, and comprehensive audit trails for PR, deployment, and release approvals

entries.name: batch-commit-processor
entries.intent: Process multiple commits in batch with time aggregation and comment deduplication

entries.name: batch-processor
entries.intent: Processes bulk Jira operations with intelligent batching, rate limiting, rollback support, and comprehensive progress tracking

entries.name: bulk-importer
entries.intent: Imports issues from CSV, Excel, and JSON files with field mapping, validation, duplicate detection, and comprehensive error handling

entries.name: chain-of-thought-reasoner
entries.intent: Linear step-by-step reasoning agent for sequential problem solving. ALWAYS queries Context7 for documentation before reasoning about any library, framework, or API.

entries.name: checkpoint-pr-manager
entries.intent: Manage incremental draft PRs during CODE phase when splitting strategy requires multiple PRs

entries.name: code-quality-enforcer
entries.intent: Expert agent for enforcing SOLID principles, clean code standards, and architectural patterns across the codebase with automated analysis and refactoring suggestions

entries.name: code-reviewer
entries.intent: Comprehensive code reviewer for orchestration workflow - deep analysis of logic, security, performance, accessibility, test coverage, and documentation quality before PR creation

entries.name: commit-message-generator
entries.intent: Generates high-quality conventional commit messages from Jira issue context and git diff analysis

entries.name: commit-orchestrator
entries.intent: Unified commit operations agent - generate, validate, and track commits with Jira smart commit integration

entries.name: commit-tracker
entries.intent: Track commits, map them to Jira issues, and post detailed commit summaries with Confluence references

entries.name: completion-flow-orchestrator
entries.intent: Orchestrates the complete task completion flow including sub-issue monitoring, gap analysis, Confluence documentation, commit creation, and issue commenting with full traceability

entries.name: completion-orchestrator
entries.intent: Orchestrate the full completion workflow - PR creation, sub-item documentation, and QA transitions

entries.name: compliance-reporter
entries.intent: Compliance Reporter Agent

entries.name: confluence-documentation-creator
entries.intent: Create Confluence documentation at orchestration phases with Jira/PR linking

entries.name: confluence-manager
entries.intent: Manages Confluence documentation based on Jira issues - reads requirements, writes technical docs, creates runbooks, syncs with Jira, maintains documentation lifecycle

entries.name: council-coordinator
entries.intent: Coordinates agent council reviews using the blackboard pattern for collaborative multi-agent analysis

entries.name: dependency-mapper
entries.intent: Cross-project dependency detection, visualization, impact analysis, circular dependency detection, critical path calculation, and blocking issue identification

entries.name: discord-notifier
entries.intent: Sends notifications to Discord channels using Discord API with rich embeds, mentions, and threading support

entries.name: documentation-hub
entries.intent: Unified documentation agent for TDD, ADR, API docs, runbooks, Confluence pages, and Jira-Confluence linking with optimized CQL queries

entries.name: documentation-sync-agent
entries.intent: Ensures Confluence documentation is created, updated, and linked for all Jira issues and sub-issues. Automatically syncs READMEs with Confluence pages and maintains bidirectional links between Jira, Confluence, and code repositories.

entries.name: documentation-writer
entries.intent: Comprehensive documentation writer for DOCUMENT phase - creates README, API docs, ADRs, code comments, changelogs, Confluence pages, user guides, and runbooks

entries.name: draft-pr-manager
entries.intent: Create draft PR immediately after PLAN phase and update it throughout development for early visibility and feedback

entries.name: epic-decomposer
entries.intent: Breaks down epics into manageable user stories and tasks using INVEST principles, user journey analysis, dependency mapping, and adaptive learning from past decompositions

entries.name: escalation-manager
entries.intent: Escalation Manager Agent

entries.name: event-sourcing-orchestrator
entries.intent: Event sourcing system for complete orchestration audit trail, state reconstruction, time-travel debugging, and event replay capabilities

entries.name: expert-agent-matcher
entries.intent: Advanced expertise matching system - Deep multi-dimensional analysis to select optimal experts with confidence scoring, team composition optimization, and load balancing

entries.name: export-generator
entries.intent: Generates PDF reports, Excel/CSV exports, and JSON exports with custom templates, scheduling, and distribution capabilities

entries.name: external-documentation-publisher
entries.intent: Publishes documentation to external platforms beyond Confluence - GitHub Wiki, API docs sites, GitBook, Notion, automated README updates, and blog posts

entries.name: governance-auditor
entries.intent: Complete audit trail management for all decisions, compliance reporting, change log generation, access pattern analysis, risk assessment, and SOC2/ISO27001 evidence collection.

entries.name: harness-api-expert
entries.intent: Expert agent for Harness REST API operations including authentication, organizations, projects, pipelines, triggers, services, environments, connectors, secrets, executions, and module-specific APIs (GitOps, Feature Flags, IaCM, Chaos, STO, CCM)

entries.name: harness-jira-sync
entries.intent: Automate bidirectional synchronization between Harness CD and Jira for pipelines, deployments, Git repositories, pull requests, and code review comments using Harness MCP

entries.name: hypothesis-debugger
entries.intent: Hypothesis-driven debugging agent that systematically tests theories to find root causes. ALWAYS checks documentation for expected behavior before forming hypotheses.

entries.name: infrastructure-orchestrator
entries.intent: Expert infrastructure agent for creating modular Harness repositories, managing Kubernetes deployments, Helm charts, and Terraform infrastructure with deep GitOps knowledge

entries.name: intelligence-analyzer
entries.intent: Intelligence and analytics module for the jira-orchestrator - provides predictive analytics, learning from history, smart prioritization, velocity tracking, and pattern recognition to optimize agent selection and task execution

entries.name: issue-validator
entries.intent: CRITICAL SAFETY AGENT - Validates issue key before ANY Jira operation. MUST be called first to prevent working on wrong issues.

entries.name: learning-coordinator
entries.intent: Coordinates real-time learning across all agents, manages knowledge consolidation, and optimizes agent selection based on historical performance

entries.name: metrics-dashboard
entries.intent: Real-time orchestration metrics dashboard with SLA tracking, quality metrics, throughput analysis, and agent performance monitoring

entries.name: notification-analytics
entries.intent: Analyzes notification delivery metrics, user engagement, channel performance, and provides insights for optimization

entries.name: notification-router
entries.intent: Routes Jira orchestration events to appropriate notification channels (Slack, Teams, Email, Webhooks) with intelligent filtering, batching, and priority management

entries.name: pagerduty-notifier
entries.intent: Creates and manages PagerDuty incidents for critical Jira Orchestrator events with proper severity, deduplication, and auto-resolution

entries.name: parallel-sub-issue-worker
entries.intent: Discovers, analyzes dependencies, and coordinates parallel execution of Jira sub-issues using DAG-based scheduling with intelligent agent routing per sub-issue

entries.name: pattern-analyzer
entries.intent: Extracts learnable patterns from task outcomes using extended thinking (8000 token budget) to identify success factors, failure modes, and transferable knowledge

entries.name: performance-tracker
entries.intent: Tracks and analyzes agent performance metrics in real-time, generates performance reports, identifies trends, and provides data-driven recommendations

entries.name: policy-enforcer
entries.intent: Policy definition and evaluation engine for code quality gates, security requirements, review policies, branch protection, and compliance checks

entries.name: portfolio-manager
entries.intent: Multi-project portfolio management with aggregated metrics, cross-project dependencies, resource allocation, strategic alignment, and executive-level reporting

entries.name: pr-creator
entries.intent: Create high-quality pull requests via Harness Code with Confluence documentation and Jira integration

entries.name: pr-documentation-logger
entries.intent: Log all documentation and interactions to PR comments for complete audit trail

entries.name: pr-size-estimator
entries.intent: Analyze planned work and estimate final PR size to recommend splitting strategy before CODE phase begins

entries.name: qa-comment-responder
entries.intent: Monitors and responds to comments on QA tickets, providing clarifications and updates

entries.name: qa-confluence-documenter
entries.intent: Creates visually impressive Confluence documentation with main hub pages and linked sub-pages for each task

entries.name: qa-ticket-reviewer
entries.intent: Reviews JIRA tickets in QA status, improves content quality, condenses descriptions, and ensures completeness

entries.name: qa-transition
entries.intent: Transition Jira issues and all sub-items to QA status after work completion

entries.name: quality-enhancer
entries.intent: Enhanced code quality reviewer for orchestration workflow - validates best practices, security, performance, accessibility, and documentation

entries.name: quality-intelligence
entries.intent: Advanced quality analytics and intelligence system - tracks technical debt, quality trends, health scores, hotspots, security intelligence, and predictive quality metrics

entries.name: release-coordinator
entries.intent: Multi-project release planning, release train management, automated release notes, rollback coordination, feature flag management, and go/no-go decision support

entries.name: requirements-analyzer
entries.intent: Deep analysis of Jira issue requirements to ensure clarity, completeness, and testability before implementation begins

entries.name: review-facilitator
entries.intent: Break down PR reviews into small, manageable tasks that can be reviewed independently in 5-15 minute chunks

entries.name: review-orchestrator
entries.intent: Orchestrate code review workflows from creation to completion with progress tracking

entries.name: review-progress-tracker
entries.intent: Track review status across all sub-item chunks with progress dashboards in Jira

entries.name: roadmap-planner
entries.intent: Visual roadmap generation with timeline planning, dependency-aware scheduling, release train coordination, milestone tracking, and capacity-based forecasting

entries.name: root-cause-analyzer
entries.intent: Deep root cause analysis agent using 5 Whys, Fishbone diagrams, and causal chain analysis. ALWAYS grounds analysis in documentation and system facts.

entries.name: skill-mapper
entries.intent: Team skills inventory management with expertise tracking, skill gap analysis, training recommendations, optimal task assignment, knowledge transfer tracking, and skill coverage reporting

entries.name: sla-monitor
entries.intent: SLA Monitor Agent

entries.name: slack-notifier
entries.intent: Delivers Jira orchestration notifications to Slack using Block Kit, managing threads, interactive buttons, and rich formatting for optimal user experience

entries.name: smart-commit-validator
entries.intent: Pre-flight validation of smart commit parameters to prevent failed commits and ensure data integrity

entries.name: sprint-planner
entries.intent: Automated sprint planning with capacity calculation, velocity tracking, backlog prioritization, commitment suggestions, sprint health monitoring, and adaptive learning from past sprint outcomes

entries.name: sub-item-documenter
entries.intent: Document implementation details on all Jira sub-items after work completion

entries.name: tag-manager
entries.intent: Tag Manager Agent

entries.name: task-enricher
entries.intent: Enriches Jira tasks with technical context, requirements analysis, codebase references, and adaptive learning from past enrichment effectiveness.

entries.name: team-capacity-planner
entries.intent: Advanced team capacity planning with workload tracking, availability management, sprint forecasting, over-allocation detection, resource leveling, and velocity analysis

entries.name: test-strategist
entries.intent: Test Strategist

entries.name: transition-manager
entries.intent: Intelligent Jira workflow state management with fuzzy matching and validation

entries.name: tree-of-thought-reasoner
entries.intent: Branching exploration agent for problems with multiple solution paths. ALWAYS queries Context7 for documentation and explores trade-offs systematically.

entries.name: triage-agent
entries.intent: Jira Issue Triage Agent

entries.name: webhook-publisher
entries.intent: Publishes Jira orchestration events to external webhook endpoints with retry logic, signature verification, and event filtering

entries.name: workload-balancer
entries.intent: Workload distribution analysis and balancing with rebalancing recommendations, bottleneck identification, context switching analysis, meeting load impact assessment, and burnout risk detection.

entries.name: worklog-manager
entries.intent: Manages Jira time tracking and worklog entries with smart time parsing, validation, and remaining estimate tracking

entries.name: worktree-orchestrator
entries.intent: Worktree Orchestrator Agent
